title: Panel, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
description: Hanging of fine black wool, embroidered in colored silks and metal thread. Shows an all-over floral pattern and floral border. Lined with yellow silk.
